message: The last pair of 515's I bought was from Amazon in Feb 2019. They were V1 and I love them. I saw these V3 in black and team red and had to have them. I ordered the same size 11 - but when they were delivered they was way short in the toe. I returned them and got the replacements yesterday in size 11.5 US men. I am wearing them today for the first time, and I honestly could have gone to size 12 primarily based on my big toe on both feet. If you're moving from an older version, consider sizing up. But Amazon is awesome and will sort you out if you need to exchange. I did not deduct a star since I bought a new model without trying on (but I own more than a couple of New Balance all in size 11).

I love the style and fit of these shoes but the insole that comes with the shoes are garbage. They are literally paper thin. I thought ahead and bought myself a pair of memory foam insoles to go with the shoes because I’ve been having heel pain, and I’m glad I did. They are not comfortable at all, at least not for me without a good pair of insoles. Once I put my fave insoles in them they are good to go. I love the colors of these shoes. We’ll see how long they hold up but for now I am happy with my purchase.

Great for wide feet!!! But make sure you chose the wide option. They were a gift for someone. I just received a call thanking me for buying these due how comfortable these are and perfect for wide feet.

My husband works for a school whose school colors are purple and yellow. He bought these for some school spirit and they’ve so far been a hit. Not only has he gotten lots of compliments, but he’s even had to share the direct link with others so that they could go and buy themselves a pair too! And it’s no surprise, because they really are a sharp looking shoe. Also unsurprisingly, these shoes are excellent quality and great comfort right out of the box.
I like that they have 4E in my size.
They are what I expected. No surprises
I bought these sneakers for my brother as he couldn't find what he liked in the stores.  He was very pleased with them.  The fit was true to size and comfortable.
I love these shoes and have multiple different pair. This pair fits a bit tighter than the previous. Still love the shoe and will buy more!
They fit perfectly and helped with the pain in my feet so much more than I expected!
They came in on time and they fit my son perfect for school we actually bought another pair in all black I would totally recommend these sneakers and the seller shipped on time thanks again🙏

At first I only wore these as a cosplay of a '90s guy. But man, I really forgot how comfortable New Balance shoes can be. Now I wear them everywhere, while getting compliments about this its neat colors.
I buy NB for the generous fit of the wide toe box.  These seem a little "close" compared to other NB shoes I've owned. Not returning them, but would not buy again.

Purchased these for my son. They run about a half size bit bigger than his previous pair of NB shoes. Since my sons foot is still growing have a show to grow into isn’t an issue. Over all great solid shoe.
fit was good would buy again
I got these for my boyfriend and he's happy with them. They looked a little cheap but he says there comfy and are holding up well. He's on his feet 12 to 20 hrs. sometimes depending on his shift.
Love these shoes. Super comfortable. Very lightweight. Feels like walking on air.
Durable and comfortable. Will buy again and again
Like NB, light weight, comfortable

This NB #515 is a Tried and True design . It is a no frills shoe but with Good Glue . Some competitors products of comparable pricing will be completely unusable in half the time . The reason for not 5 stars is minor toe jam which still persists after 50 miles , the break is longer than I recall .
These shoes are comfortable. May get dirty easily due to light color.
New Balance is awesome as always!
Nun else to say u getting what’s on the picture fits nice
Fantastic quality and comfortable sneakers
Husband is a teacher at 70 and is on his feet all day.  He has good luck with new balance
I have bought these in the past and really like them for my wide feet. However,  I had to order a 1\2 size bigger this time.  There great for walking.
Great price, perfect fit and swift delivery!

Fits as expected. Great classic look from NB there never gets old

Good Sneakers, I bought them for my son and he was happy with them and they fit well- even considering that my son has wide feet
Nice fit
Should have ordered the ones that were wide because of my left foot that is flat footed, but overall a very nice shoe. I also have a green pair of the samething, that's why I ordered this pair.

Really like the 515! The Amazon Warehouse had my size for only about ~$50 which made it even better - I had been looking for a few 'go-to' sneaker that I could wear on walks, trips to the store, dropping kids off at school...and I think I found it. I've never had a pair of New Balance before, but was impressed with how the shoes felt comfortable so soon after receiving them...not really a long breaking-in period which was nice. I also like that there is a wide range of color choices so I'll probably grab another pair in the near future when I see them pop up in the warehouse!
Probably the best 50 bucks I ever spent. I feel like I’m walking on baby kittens.

I bought these for everyday casual wear. These are not intended for a serious amount of running or walking---far less cushioning than the dozen or so other New Balance shoes I've worn over the past 20 years. They also run a little longer than other shoes in this brand. Overall, they are good for casual use so long as you're not going to be walking too far or standing for a very long time.
Good quality and comfortable
Fits as expected, looks really good.
Product was as described and fit as expected.
What we expect from new balance shoes
The media could not be loaded.
Great in person.  Good deal
Besides a scuff on the right shoe… They are perfect 👍🏾
NB shoes fit my feet better than any other brand.  Good looking, comfortable walking around casual sneaker.  There are cush-ier and fancier styles in the NB lineup but this one is a great value.

The reviews looked good and I have rarely been disappointed by New Balance, but these didn't work out. Despite ordering my typical size for NB these were a bit snug but more importantly they just felt cheap. For the price I wasn't expecting the top of the line, but these just were uncomfortable beyond being tighter than I expected, the foot bed felt hard, and I didn't have confidence they would last very long (my pair of 1540s last more than a year despite me being a very heavy set guy). If they had fit I might have tried a different insert, but overall, I decided to go with the more expensive New Balance.
Favorite brand of and style running / walking shoe for everyday activities.  Cool and light weight with a variety of colors.  Machine washable when needed.  Great value for the money.
The media could not be loaded. Colors in the shoes more design colors that will get peoples attention but these shoes that are a size 14 Are Way better can’t go any higher than that
Toe box is small / tight. Firm soles.
Fit great, love them
The s colors and fit were perfect! Buying more of these in different colors! Highly recommend

This shoe tends to not be as comfortable as other New Balance shoes that I've purchased in the past.  I ordered a 14 wide and thought that maybe I just needed to break the shoes in.  After wearing them for a couple weeks I've had to put the shoes on the shelf as the comfort level isn't there.  It almost seems as though it's a size 14 and not a 14W.  The box indicated 14 wide, but I can't see anything on the shoe other than size 14, so maybe it was packaged and marked incorrectly.

Good shoe, the markings and tags all look correct. Only thing this time (I’ve ordered about 4 diff pairs from Amazon) is these are a little roomy. They feel like they are a wide, although they’re marked regular. Not sure what the deal is this time but I’ll just wear bigger socks, it’s almost wintertime anyway.
Love these kicks, exceeded my expectations!
Comfortable fit out of the box
My son loves them so I’m happy!  Got them on sale so that was a plus.
Just what I ordered!

As a long time NB purchaser I was excited to purchase these sneakers. I even purchased a second pair wanting to have these when the first pair wear out. I did not expect to need the spares in just a couple of months.  The soles are separating prematurely. The quality appears to have really gone down hill on NB. I will be looking elsewhere for my next sneakers. I contacted the seller multiple times in hopes of a warranty replacement to no avail. They have not responded.
I was very skeptical that these would not fit properly. New Balance offers a wide and I was shocked on how well they fit and felt on my feet. You have a new customer New Balance, thank you.
I like NBs 😁
I purchased these for my High Schooler, at 14 with the same size foot as his age. It's hard to find a shoe that fits, but he adores the fit, comfortable and his words "amazingly well" and "sturdy"
We walk an average of 3 miles per day.  Nevertheless, I would have expected the soles to be good for a year or more.  If they were $40 shoes I'd probably buy them again, but not at $80.

Good fit, very comfortable, looks well constructed, look good.
Shoe fits as expected and is really comfortable to walk/run in.
I liked the colors but my son didn't. So we returned them. He did say they were comfortable though.
These shoes are the best fitting for my feet. Very comfy; fits just right and suitable for long walks.

I really enjoy wearing this new balance shoes I can recommend to a my friends and family too.

I am really surprised at how comfortable these shoes are! I have worn tons of different brands, everything from minimalist shoes like the Merrell Vapor Gloves to highly cushioned shoes like the Hoka Challenger. These shoes are absolutely as comfortable as anything else I've worn, most of which cost substantially more. They are breathable, lightweight, and have just the right amount of cushion. Not a lot of support in the shoe which I prefer, but somehow they seem to keep my feet feeling engaged and ready for whatever I'm doing. I purchased the EE width because I have wide feet and they have a great fit with plenty of toe space, not pointed like a lot of other shoes out there. Highly recommended.

These make the perfect work shoes! I know NB released a Figs edition for healthcare workers but these are just as nice. I stand most of my day too and these are comfortable enough for me to avoid having sore shins and feet. I bought these 5 months back and look for yourself! Still as good as new. Worn 5 days a week, 8+ hours a day.

I'm a big person with wide feet, so getting a quality shoe for good price isn't easy for me. But these shoes did the trick. I get all kinds of compliments on the colors of these shoes. That's just a plus to the comfort of the shoes. We're definitely a good buy for me.
Great shoe!

These are probably the best work horse shoes I’ve had in a decade. New Balance is a brand you can trust. Shoe construction is solid, fashionable but not flashy like you’re trying too hard. Wear these shoes for long walks, workout and long shifts on your feet. Size is true to fit and plenty of space in the shoe without allowing your foot to move around so much it causes blisters and irritation. I never write reviews, but these shoes are worth it. I bought for around $50 which easily in a retail store would have spent $150.

Ad copy shows a GREEN shoe. It's pretty far from green. There's a bit of green trim and the insoles are "zombie green". But the outside is just plain GREY to me. The SOLES are very hard. Very uncomfortable to walk on hard surfaces. Feels like they are made of wood or like walking on cheap, thin, flip flops. The rubber lugs "KLONK" when I walk on our hardwood floors. Leather soled shoes are quieter. Not at all like my 160 dollar pair of NB shoes. So I guess you don't get what you don't pay for. I notice the color description problem in ALL the NB shoes I've bought in the last ten years or so. One of the colors they seem proud of is called "Pigment". Really? You name a color "Pigment"? I think that means "All the left over dye we had left in the vat, mixed to a general dark grey/purple/brown.

I recently bought these shoes because I have been searched for something that does not destroy me heels. The last few pairs of running shoes I bought have caused blisters and the inside of the shoes have broken down (heel area) within weeks. This even happened to the more expensive running shoes I purchased. This pair of shoes has been great so far! They fit well. They are lightweight. They breathe. And so far the heels are comfortable. I will be buying these as long as they have them available.

Pros: • New Balance, styling is alright. • The length fits as it should. Cons: • Trainers are cheap feeling, comparable to shoes worth half the price. You can see the glue. • The insole is poorly padded, but switchable. • The colour of the mesh isn't true black. The middle part has a warm (red) tone to it and not as black as the suede at the front. • The suede is thin feeling; I can't see these lasting very long if used off-track. They're definitely a dress trainer, but maybe only for going to the local pub or shop. • The sole is narrow, it feels like they need to be an inch wider as it feels like my feet want to flow over them like how muffins want to escape their wrapper. The mesh sort of bundles them up in an unsupported manner, which creates a rubbing problem with the rigid suede at the back. For reference they are 7 cm wide and my feet are 8 cm wide at the narrowest part. The front of the trainer is good enough for toes to wiggle though. I'll list dimensions below... Dimensions of sole: Heel 8 cm width Middle 7 cm width Front 11 cm width Inside of the trainer is 28 cm length (11 inches for UK size 11). • Even though I only tried them on for about 5 minutes I developed a short moment of plantar fasciitis pain in the arch of my left foot. To reiterate something I've said before, "I don't like buying clothes online. You just don't know what you're going to get". 👎
Schnelle Lieferung und Top Ware ! Gern wieder
